name: Mafia III
notes:
- Launcher doesn't work.
- Full screen doesn't work.
content:
game:
  appid: 360430
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    description: Please wait while .NET 4.7.2 installs.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/launcher.orig
    src: $GAMEDIR/launcher.exe
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/launcher.exe
    src: $GAMEDIR/mafia3.exe
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64,winegstreamer: disabled
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
